resources.string:
About Beseye

The name Beseye was created with the Ancient Egyptian goddess, Bes, a protector of households and a symbol of family blessing.

Bes is an Ancient Egyptian deity worshipped as a protector of households, and in particular, of mothers and children and childbirth. Bes later came to be regarded as the defender of everything good and the enemy of all that is bad.

Beseye Cloud Security Co., in the name of "via Bes’ eye," is dedicated to home and family care. With the up-to-date cloud and monitor hardware manufacturing technology, we are committed to a smarter and safer life for household users.

Want to be free from anxiety and home security risks? Want to stay with your babies as they getting older day by day, and never miss any precious moments? We propose a cloud solution to protect your loved ones and guard your home.

All you need to do is picking up your Beseye camera! Enjoy your family time!

Be smart, be free!

Focus on families with babies and kids, a brand new Beseye camera with improved cloud security service is about to be released!

Computex d&i award winner, with innovative patents, Beseye’s forthcoming product is ready to impress the world. Hold on, you’re gonna fall in love with it!
Set has options menu to true

Your camera \"%s\" is updating now, please hold on a second. After you click the Confirm button, you can check your update progress.
Update Completed! Please wait for camera rebooting.
Update suspended! Your network is too slow. Please check the network environment for the camera.
You can click the button in the next page to start the update process.\nThe update process is free and will be finished in a short time interval.
Update available, please keep power and network connected.
Updating… please keep power and network connected.
The update will complete shortly and is free of charge.
Do not remove the power supply and keep the network connected during the update process.
To access the full functions of the camera, please go back to [my camera] list and complete the update process.
To access the full functions of the camera, please complete the update process.
Your camera is offline, reconnect to the network to continue the update process.
If the update process did not complete successfully, please contact us for further assistance.

System will automatically detect the human movement. If no person is found on the next page, click on \"delete\" to obtain the best recognition results.
Technology of tomorrow \nBeseye\'s Advanced Technology Lab has introduced the most accurate and privacy-guaranteed moving-person identification technology.
With this technology, the camera will automatically notify you when a moving person is detected, allowing you real-time easy access to on-site information anywhere you go.
The world\'s best technology with customized optimization. Your camera will become smarter with each use after this process.

Camera is almost ready. Now, give your camera a name.
Please try to plug in your camera once again, and start Let it Bee™ until the green light is twinkling. Also make sure to keep your device near the camera within 10cms.
Congratulations! Your camera is ready! All you need to do is placing your camera at anywhere you want. You can unplug and move your camera , the camera setting will stay the same when power on.

Attention! Your device is going to make beeping sound in the next step.
Please plug in your camera, enter the correct Wi-Fi password, and start Let it Bee™ when the green light is twinkleing. Also make sure to keep your device near the camera within 10 cms.
